applicant_types: Imperial College Healthcare NHS Trust staff; Hospital departments; Internal NHS Trust applicants
geographic_scope: Imperial College Healthcare NHS Trust hospitals (London, UK)
beneficiary_focus: Patients and families at Imperial College Healthcare NHS Trust hospitals; NHS staff; Hospital-based projects
restrictions: Funding is only available for projects benefiting Imperial College Healthcare NHS Trust hospitals and their patients/staff; External charities or hospices not affiliated with the Trust are not eligible
notes: All funding streams and special purpose funds are restricted to projects, staff, and patients within Imperial College Healthcare NHS Trust hospitals. No indication of external grantmaking to independent charities or hospices.
evidence: All funding programmes (emergency grants, research fellowships, innovation funding, special purpose funds) are explicitly for the benefit of Imperial College Healthcare NHS Trust hospitals, their staff, and their patients. There is no mention of external grantmaking to independent charities or hospices. The application process is directed at NHS staff and internal hospital projects. Geographic scope is limited to the Trust's hospitals in London, not Kent. Therefore, ellenor Hospice, as an independent hospice in Kent, is not eligible.
